title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4012 - Possession Of Drugs And Drug Testing
content:

State Regulations
§ 4012.1 - Possession of hypodermic equipment and controlled substances
§ 4012.2 - Drug detection facilities
§ 4012.3 - Drug detection programs

§ 4012.5 - Out-of-competition testing
§ 4012.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4012

Statutory authority: Unconsolidated Laws, §
8162[1]; Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 207, 902

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
